item.bigbrain.buckler.desc.charge: Grants a Charge move upon using it for half a second
item.bigbrain.buckler.desc.bash: +Colliding with an entity will deal 6 - 8 attack damage
item.bigbrain.buckler.desc.explosion: +Colliding with an entity will cause the user to explode
item.bigbrain.buckler.desc.critical: +1 Critical Hit after colliding with an entity
item.bigbrain.buckler.desc.critSwing: -Critical Hit is lost after one swing
enchantment.bigbrain.turning.desc: Allows full turn control while charging, at the cost of the buckler losing it's shield bash ability.
enchantment.bigbrain.bang.desc: When the user shield bashes a large explosion is created. This explosion deals damage to the user and surrounding mobs.
bigbrain.advancements.nether.obtain_buck: Have a buckler in your inventory.
